sentence: Other QAnon-supporting, pro-Trump personalties are also expected to attend, including Mark Finchem, the Arizona state lawmaker running for Arizona secretary of state.
author: Josephine Harvey
title: Texas Butterfly Sanctuary Closes Due To 'Credible Threats' From Pro-Trump Event

title: 2020 Presidential Election in Maricopa County Should Be Set Aside
